courses.name: Open Water Diver
courses.description: Entry-level certification that teaches fundamental diving skills. Learn to dive safely to 18 meters/60 feet.
courses.medicalRequirements: Medical questionnaire, doctor's clearance if needed

courses.name: Advanced Open Water Diver
courses.description: Build on your Open Water skills with 5 adventure dives including deep and navigation.
courses.prerequisites: PADI Open Water Diver or equivalent

courses.name: Rescue Diver
courses.description: Learn to prevent and manage dive emergencies. Challenging but rewarding course.
courses.prerequisites: PADI Advanced Open Water Diver, EFR within 24 months

courses.name: Divemaster
courses.description: First professional level. Supervise diving activities and assist instructors.
courses.prerequisites: PADI Rescue Diver, 40 logged dives, EFR within 24 months

courses.name: Emergency First Response
courses.description: CPR and first aid training for divers and non-divers alike.

courses.name: Enriched Air Diver (Nitrox)
courses.description: Learn to dive with enriched air nitrox for longer no-decompression limits.
courses.prerequisites: PADI Open Water Diver or equivalent
